item.title: Self-Study in February 2023
item.description: CBMC: The C Bounded Model Checker CBMC on GitHub: https://github.com/diffblue/cbmc Some usage examples: https://haslab.github.io/MFES/2122/CBMCexamples-handout.pdf https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=34703004 Tags: cbmc, c, c-language, bound-check, sat-solver, tool, static-analysis, checker, imported, hacker-news Id: bbe38520-a846-11ed-957a-0242ac110002 Read: Wed Feb 8 01:46:40 2023 TESTING BAREMETAL FIRMWARE AT NUBIX Extensive guide on how to test firmware.
